<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#abf72653c55323ec0be11bb13c103bf08"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#abf72653c55323ec0be11bb13c103bf08">getCallStackHash</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation">DILocation</a> &#42;DIL) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> hashCombine = &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t Val) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::hash&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; Hasher;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> ^ (Hasher(Val) + 2654435769 + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> &lt;&lt; 6) + (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/randomnumbergenerator-cpp/#a0c7bb0b4761ae4c3f875fb9b0a235a93">Seed</a> &gt;&gt; 2));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t Ret = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt(); DIL; DIL = DIL-&gt;getInlinedAt()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    Ret = hashCombine(Ret, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23db35042db15bf83edbd2250ea0ee90">xxh3&#95;64bits</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint8&#95;t&gt;</a>(DIL-&gt;getLine())));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">    Ret = hashCombine(Ret, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a23db35042db15bf83edbd2250ea0ee90">xxh3&#95;64bits</a>(DIL-&gt;getSubprogramLinkageName()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ret;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Traverse the CFG and assign FD discriminators. If two instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// have the same lineno and discriminator, but residing in different BBs,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the latter instruction will get a new discriminator value. The new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// discriminator keeps the existing discriminator value but sets new bits</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// b/w LowBit and HighBit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MIRAddFSDiscriminators::runOnMachineFunction(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61cf315897c96016607a2b8d5916a64d">EnableFSDiscriminator</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HasPseudoProbe = MF.getFunction().getParent()-&gt;getNamedMetadata(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afe8cddc1b878bbfc7598e672f96cfbf1">PseudoProbeDescMetadataName</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!HasPseudoProbe &amp;&amp; !MF.getFunction().shouldEmitDebugInfoForProfiling())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask of discriminators before this pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO(xur): simplify this once we switch to ImprovedFSDiscriminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LowBitTemp = LowBit;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LowBit &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;LowBit in FSDiscriminator cannot be 0&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90b03a5ed7ead5551ff645caf7804633">ImprovedFSDiscriminator</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    LowBitTemp -= 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitMaskBefore = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139">getN1Bits</a>(LowBitTemp);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask of discriminators including this pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitMaskNow = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa860d116fc20fde892f7485b706f9139">getN1Bits</a>(HighBit);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mask of discriminators for bits specific to this pass.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BitMaskThisPass = BitMaskNow ^ BitMaskBefore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumNewD = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;MIRAddFSDiscriminators working on Func: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; MF.getFunction().getName() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; Highbit=&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; HighBit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasPseudoProbe) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isPseudoProbe())</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a90b03a5ed7ead5551ff645caf7804633">ImprovedFSDiscriminator</a> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isMetaInstruction()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Use the id of pseudo probe to compute the discriminator.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LineNo =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Clean up discriminators for pseudo probes at the first FS discriminator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass as their discriminators should not ever be used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((Pass == FSDiscriminatorPass::Pass1) &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.isPseudoProbe()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      DiscriminatorCurrPass &amp;= BitMaskThisPass;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewDIL = DIL-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dilocation/#ab7345daa994ad45abb206b757dda7f22">cloneWithDiscriminator</a>(NewD);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!NewDIL) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Could not encode discriminator: &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="normal">                          &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
